Nile Bank Ltd bụ ụlọ akụ onwe onye edebanyere aha na Uganda, ya na ndị nwere òkè si Uganda, Israel, na South Africa
Ụlọ akụ Naịl na-ekwusi ike na ụlọ akụ ndị ahịa.
E hiwere Nile Bank na 1988 maka ebumnuche inye ọha mmadụ ọrụ ụlọ akụ n'oge ụlọ akụ dị ọnụ ala fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ na ọ dịghị na Uganda
Ka ọ na-erule 1992 ụlọ akụ ahụ nwere alaka abụọ wee gbasaa ruo alaka isii gụnyere alaka dị na Mbarara, Entebbe na Jinja
Ụlọ akụ ahụ nwere ihe dị ka ndị ahịa Puku iri itoolu  na January 2003, Nile Bank ghọrọ otu n'ime ụlọ akụ mbụ Uganda nwetara asambodo ISO.
Na June 2007 ụlọ akụ Barclays zụtara ụlọ akụ Nile
Barclays kpebiri ijikọ ndị ahịa-base ma mee nkwalite sistemụ IT n'otu oge.
Ịkọwa ihe n'onwe ya  Ọrụ ụlọ akụ gbadoro ụkwụ na isi obodo Kampala
Ụlọ akụ etinyela ego n'inye ọrụ ụlọ akụ na-ewe awa 24 n'ahịa ahịa ya
Ụlọ akụ ahụ nwere igwe 21 Automated Teller Machines (ATM) na na gburugburu Kampala na 3 na Mbarara, Entebbe na Jinja na-ebute mkpokọta iri abụọ na anọ (24) site na Jenụwarị 2004..

Nile Bank na-enye CreditSource maka mgbazinye ndị ahịa;  FlexiSource maka obere ụlọ ọrụ dị obere na ọkara (SMEs);  WheelSource maka mgbazinye ụgbọ ala;  yana EntertainmentSource maka ịzụrụ ihe onyonyo na satịlaịtị.
Western Union↵Nile Bank bụ onye nnọchi anya Ugandan maka ọrụ mbufe ego Western Union, na-enyefe azụmahịa 200,000 kwa afọ.
Na June 2007, 100% nke Nile Bank Limited bụ nke Barclays Bank nwetara site n'aka onye isi na-ekere òkè, onye ọchụnta ego Israel Hezi Bezalel, wee bụrụ akụkụ nke Barclay Bank (Uganda) Limited.
